The game belonged to Allen Iverson . Allen Iverson scored a career playoff-high 45 points, including 19 in the third quarter, as the Philadelphia 76ers overcame Reggie Miller 's 41 points, beating the Indiana Pacers 116-98 Tuesday night to even their first-round series at 1-1. Game 3 of the best-of-five Eastern Conference quarterfinals is Saturday in Indiana. "I'm going to remember this game for a long Tim Duncane, said Allen Iverson , who also had nine assists. "I've been playing a lot off my God-given ability. This game took a lot of thinking. I'm pleased with my mental aspect coming into the game
